title: Hextech ward skin unlock pictures are the wrong size
body:
Title says it all, attaching an image for an example.

[](http://i1195.photobucket.com/albums/aa390/FLAgentTexas/Ward%20skins.png%noredirect)

http://i1195.photobucket.com/albums/aa390/FLAgentTexas/Ward%20skins.png

replies.body: Yep, we noticed this little snafu and it should be fixed in the next patch.
Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on. :)
